    • getCampList

      public ArrayList<Camp> getCampList(user.User user, CampInfo campInfo, filehandler.Database database, clock.Time clock)
      Overloaded method to fetch list of camps that a specific student can register for
      Parameters:
      user - Specific student
      campInfo - Database of Camps
      database - Database of Users
      clock - Current date
      Returns:
      List of camps a specific student can register for

    • updateAttendeeSlotsUsed

      public void updateAttendeeSlotsUsed(boolean isIncrement, Camp camp, int value)
      Method to update attendee slots used for a specific camp
      Parameters:
      isIncrement - Indication of whether attendee slots used should be increased or decreased
      camp - Specific camp that requires updating of attendee slots used
      value - Number to increase or decrease by during updating of attendee slots used

    • updateCommitteeSlotUsed

      public void updateCommitteeSlotUsed(Camp camp, int value)
      Method to add committee slots used for a specific camp
      Parameters:
      camp - Specific camp that requires updating of camp committee slots used
      value - Number to increase by during updating of camp committee slots used

    • getAttendeeSlotsUsed

      public int getAttendeeSlotsUsed(Camp camp)
      Method to fetch attendee slots used for a specific camp
      Parameters:
      camp - Specific Camp
      Returns:
      Attendee slots used for that specific camp, returns -1 if camp does not exist

    • setVisiblity

      public boolean setVisiblity(Camp camp, boolean isVisible, boolean isStaff)
      Standard method to set visibility of a specific camp
      Parameters:
      camp - Specific camp
      isVisible - Visibility to set specific camp
      isStaff - Indicates whether method caller is a Staff object(true) or is from filehandler package(false)
      Returns:
      Boolean value indicating success of setting visibility
